name: The World of Motorcycles
description:
- Become a free rider in the world of motorcycles -

Greetings, bike lovers, "The World of Motorcycles" is a 3D motorcycles game for mobile devices.
This game tries to bring/emulate the ultimate experience of riding a bike in a virtual land. The game is constantly updated and involving. More modes and tracks will be added to the game. Right now, the player can drive a variety of different motorcycles, from racing bike to powerful road cruiser. They are 4 driving views you can switch on the fly, and the game also comes with a worldwide Leaderboard where you can show off your high score!

One of the biggest focus in this game is its super graphics, we work hard to bring the best 3D graphics possible for current mobile devices. Furthermore, the player has the power to enable and disable graphic features as he/her likes. We hope through this degree of freedom of control, each player can have the best balance between gaming performance and visual fidelity !

Let's ride on !
